joinTable.title: Join Table
joinTable.headline: Join the table!
joinTable.subtitle: Scan the QR or enter the code manually
joinTable.securityNotice: Your information is protected. Only the host can see your order.

assistant.title: Smart Assistant
assistant.greeting: Hello! I'm your smart assistant. How can I help you today? You can ask me about how to use the app, the menu, your order, or any other general questions.

settings.title: Settings

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.smartTranslationDesc: Automatically translates menus and reviews in real time

settings.privacyNotice: Artificial intelligence uses locally processed data to protect your privacy.

order.title: My Order
order.addItems: Explore our menu and add delicious products
order.confirmedAndSent: Order confirmed and sent to kitchen
order.enjoyMeal: Enjoy your meal. Payment will be made when you finish.
order.addMoreProducts: Add more products to your order
order.specialInstructionsPlaceholder: E.g. Bring all dishes at the same time, serve drinks first...
order.finishedSelecting: Have you finished selecting your food?
order.canUnmark: You can unmark if you need to make changes
order.markWhenFinished: Mark when you've finished adding all your products

status.sentDescription: Your order has been sent and is waiting for restaurant confirmation
status.receivedDescription: The restaurant has accepted your order and is validating availability
status.preparingDescription: The kitchen is preparing your order
status.readyToDeliverDescription: Your order is ready and will be delivered shortly
status.deliveringDescription: The waiter is on the way to your table
status.deliveredDescription: Your order has been delivered. Enjoy your meal!
status.withIssuesDescription: A problem has been reported with your order. We are resolving it
status.closedDescription: The order has been closed and paid

profile.title: My Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.deleteCardWarning: This action cannot be undone. The card will be permanently deleted.

payment.enjoyMessage: We hope you enjoyed your meal!
payment.reviewOrder: Review your order and select the payment method.
payment.assistanceMessage: If you have any questions or notice any inconsistency in your order, select «Request assistance» and an assistant will come to your table.

paymentSuccess.title: Payment successful!
paymentSuccess.wantInvoice: Do you want to receive the invoice?
paymentSuccess.confirmFiscalData: I confirm that my fiscal data is correct
paymentSuccess.updateFromProfile: If you need to update your data, you can do so from your profile.
paymentSuccess.selectEmail: Select the email address to send the invoice

addCard.title: Add Card
addCard.description: Enter your credit or debit card information
addCard.securityNotice: Your data is protected with end-to-end encryption. We do not store your CVV.
addCard.invalidCardNumber: Please enter a valid card number
addCard.invalidExpiryDate: Please enter a valid expiry date
addCard.cardScanned: Card data captured. Please enter the CVV manually.
addCard.placeCardInFrame: Place the card inside the frame
addCard.ensureWellLit: Make sure the card is well lit and focused
addCard.cameraError: Could not access camera. Please enter the data manually.

billing.dragFile: Drag your file here or press to search in your documents
billing.aiNotice: Our AI will automatically identify your RFC, Business Name and Tax Regime.
billing.billingInformationDesc: Complete your information to automatically generate invoices for your breakfast expenses quickly and easily.
billing.rfcHint: Enter your RFC with 12 or 13 characters.
billing.regimeHint: Must match your Tax Status Certificate.
billing.uploadCertificateDesc: Upload the PDF of your Tax Status Certificate or scan it with your camera. We will use AI to automatically extract your data.

invite.title: Invite to Order
invite.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email or phone...
invite.allUsersInOrder: All available users are already in the order

orderDetail.title: Order Details
orderDetail.modificationsMessage: Your order can be modified while the kitchen hasn't started preparing it. If you need to make changes, use the "Change my order" button available on this screen.
orderDetail.orderInPreparationMessage: Your order is already being prepared by our kitchen. At this time, modifications are not possible. If you need assistance, please contact our staff.

orderConfirmed.title: Order Confirmed
orderConfirmed.orderSentMessage: Your order has been sent to the kitchen and is being prepared
orderConfirmed.enjoyMessage: Enjoy your meal. Payment will be processed when you finish.
orderConfirmed.readyToPayMessage: When you finish eating, you can proceed to payment from this same order or from the payments section.

transactionDetail.title: Transaction Detail
transactionDetail.notFoundMessage: Could not find the requested transaction

emailConfig.title: Shipping Configuration
emailConfig.whereToSend: Where do we send your invoices?
emailConfig.whereToSendDesc: Configure the email addresses where you will automatically receive your XML and PDF files every morning.
emailConfig.addEmailToReceive: Add an email address to receive your invoices
emailConfig.autoSendOnPaymentDesc: Generate and send the invoice immediately after each breakfast consumption.
emailConfig.dataSecurity: Your data is handled securely under SAT protocols.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.verifyInfo: Verify that the captured information is correct before finishing the configuration.
